analysis.description:
BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/13/0xda9cb599e9918da5f50c1b7c5432084037e48f53.sol#58) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/13/0xda9cb599e9918da5f50c1b7c5432084037e48f53.sol#59-63)
tokenAmount in MTC.calculateIcoTokenAmount (/unique_chucks/13/0xda9cb599e9918da5f50c1b7c5432084037e48f53.sol#366) is a local variable never initialiazed
